title: Xbox Wireless Controller Maintenance
description: How to clean and maintain your Xbox Wireless Controller for optimal performance
author: Gaming Expert

sections.title: Why Maintenance Matters
sections.content:
Regular maintenance ensures your Xbox Wireless Controller continues performing at its best and extends its lifespan.

Common issues prevented:

  • Sticky buttons
  • Analog stick drift
  • Dirty contacts
  • Battery degradation

content.caption: Xbox Wireless Controller ready for cleaning

sections.title: Cleaning Process
sections.content:
External Cleaning

  1. Turn off the controller and remove batteries
  2. Use isopropyl alcohol (70%+) and cotton swabs
  3. Clean around buttons and analog sticks
  4. Wipe down the entire surface with a microfiber cloth
  5. Allow to dry completely before reassembly

Button Maintenance

For sticky buttons:

  1. Use compressed air to blow out debris
  2. Apply small amount of contact cleaner if needed
  3. Work buttons several times to distribute cleaner
